content.text: Match ends, Watford 3, Bristol City 0.
Second Half ends, Watford 3, Bristol City 0.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Zak Vyner.
Goal!  Watford 3, Bristol City 0. Etienne Capoue (Watford) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Troy Deeney.
Substitution, Watford. Ben Watson replaces Abdoulaye Doucouré.
Attempt saved. Freddy Hinds (Bristol City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marlon Pack.
Attempt blocked. Etienne Capoue (Watford) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Richarlison.
Substitution, Bristol City. Freddy Hinds replaces Cauley Woodrow.
Attempt missed. Molla Wagué (Watford) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Abdoulaye Doucouré following a corner.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Luke Steele.
Attempt saved. José Holebas (Watford) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Marvin Zeegelaar.
Attempt missed. Gustav Engvall (Bristol City) right footed shot from very close range misses to the right. Assisted by Niclas Eliasson with a cross.
Attempt missed. Richarlison (Watford) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Marvin Zeegelaar with a cross.
Foul by Connor Lemonheigh-Evans (Bristol City).
